title: Jabal: Ali Di Ghiaccio (2013)
overview: Two inseparable friends with a passion for extreme adventure organize an expedition to Mount Etna to debunk the legend of a rare animal who lives in the snowy peaks of the largest active volcano. Once up there, something mysterious happens that will change forever their fate.
storyline: Two inseparable friends with a passion for extreme adventure organize an expedition to Mount Etna to debunk the legend of a rare animal who lives in the snowy peaks of the largest active volcano. Once up there, something mysterious happens that will change forever their fate.
synopsis: Two inseparable friends with a passion for adventure trips to esoteric places organize an expedition to Mount Etna to debunk the legend of the Cirneco albino, a rare animal, with extraordinary powers, who lives in the snowy peaks of the largest active volcano. Once up there, something mysterious happens that will change forever their fate to the point of forcing a police captain to reconstruct what happened to the two explorers on the mountain, and before discovering the truth about who they really are. Friendship, love and passion are the tracks that lead the investigator on the journey of reason, that not always will solve a mystery.
